Package javax0.wtf

Interface ActionDefinition

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Definition, NamedEntity
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleActionDefinition

    public interface ActionDefinition
extends Definition
    This interface represents an action definition. The getter methods return either an object that implements the interface (see the return value of the getters) or may return null if there is no such object related to the action.

    Note that several steps may use the same action definition to transfer the workflow from one step to others and many action definitions may share conditions, validators and pre/post- functions, therefore the classes implementing the interface Function have to be thread safe.

    Also note that these interfaces extending Function use different method names to perform their task and thus a class may implement more than one of these interfaces.

    Author:
    Peter Verhas
